text: Lindsay Greenbush and Sidney Greenbush were born on May 25, 1970 in Hollywood, California. They are twins and when they were children, they were actresses. Their most known television series is Little House on the Prairie, where they together played Carrie Ingalls. It all happened in the 1970s. Later, they tried to go on acting but finally decided not to. title: Lindsay and Sidney Greenbush
